      • getPath

        public java.lang.String getPath()
        Returns:
        the BeanPathAdapter.PATH_SEPARATOR separated path of the field value that changed. When the path involves an item within a collection the path to the item will be separated with BeanPathAdapter.COLLECTION_ITEM_PATH_SEPARATOR
